text:
Ro: Hey guys, it’s Ro, welcome to another
Nerdy Nummies!
CM: What you doing with you hand?
Ro: This is the Nerdy Nummies motion.
CM: Oh, me like that! Me try that!
Ro: Yeah do this.
CM: Nerdy Nummies!
Ro: Nerdy Nummies.
CM: Yeah!

Ro: As you guys can see, my special guest
today is Cookie Monster!
CM: YES!
Ro: The Cookie Monster!
CM: That me!

Ro: I can’t believe you’re in my kitchen,
we’re gonna bake together!
CM: Huh, we going to bake cookies!?
Ro: Yes!
CM: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy! Me no can wait for cookies!

Ro: We have a lot in common, we both share
a love of cookies and you

Ro: guys may not know this, but it is Cookie
Monster’s birthday tomorrow.
CM: Yeah!

Ro: November 2nd, so we are gonna be making
something in honor of
Ro: your birthday. We’re gonna be making my favorite chocolate chip cookie.
CM: That me favorite too! Chocolate chip cookie.
Ro: And it’s Cookie Monster sized.
CM: Oh boy!
Ro: Alright, so you ready to get started?
CM: Me ready 5 minutes ago, let’s do it!
Both: Let’s get started!
CM: COOKIES!

Ro: The ingredients you will need, will be:
2 sticks of salted butter

Ro: at room temperature, 12 ounces of semi-sweet
chocolate chips.
CM: Ooooh, chocolate chippies! Nom-nom-nom-nom-nom!
Ro: Yes, yes, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
CM: Me gonna wait, me gonna wait.
Ro: OK, OK!
Ro: 2-1/2 cups of all purpose flour.
CM: Oh me got it on me fur.
Ro: Uh-oh, uh-oh! CM: It OK. It OK.
Ro: It’s OK, oh it’s OK!

Ro: 2 eggs, 3/4 cup of light brown sugar,
3/4 cup of granulated sugar,

Ro: 2 teaspoons of baking soda, 1 teaspoon
of vanilla extract,
Ro: and 1 teaspoon salt. I’m also gonna be using a ice cream scoop,

Ro: it holds about 3 ounces, for our cookie
measurements.
Ro: Now let’s put it all together!
CM: Oh can me try that with you?
Ro: Yeah, are you ready?
CM: Yeah me ready!
Ro: Now let’s….
Both: Put it all together!

Ro: The first thing that we’re gonna do
is whisk together our dry ingredients

Ro: in this bowl right here, Cookie Monster
will you help me?
CM: Me would love to help!
Ro: Add the flour.
CM: OK, put flour in bowl.
Ro: Mmmhmmm, in the bowl.
Ro: Oh, mmm, yeah, yeah, ohhhhh. CM: How that?
Ro: That’s really good!
CM: Very professionally done?
Ro: Yes, very….
CM: Uh-oh, it on me hand.
Ro: I’ll help you, it’s OK!
CM: A-hugh a-hugh!
Ro: Pfft-pfft-pfft!
CM: Oh it all over the place!
CM: OK, now what me do?

Ro: OK, now you’re gonna add your salt and
baking soda.

CM: There goes the salt, OK here comes baking
soda.

CM: OK, now we just kind of mix it up like
that?
Ro: Yeah, well here’s a whisk.
CM: OK, me take whisk.
Ro: Here you go.

Ro: And then whisk it together until it’s
well combined.
Ro: Mix it up! Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah!
CM: OH! OH! Pffft!
Ro: OH! Is that good?
CM: Yeah, we got to clear the air here!

Ro: OK, then we’re gonna set this off to
the side!
CM: Yeah, OK, set it off to the side lady!

Ro: The next thing that we’re gonna do,
is we’re gonna cream together our

Ro: sugars and our butters into a bigger mixing
bowl.
CM: Oh boy!

Ro: And, we’re gonna be using an electric
mixer.
CM: Terrific!

Ro: And, you did such a good job mixing last
time that now I’m gonna do it. CM: Thank you!
Ro: We’re gonna share the baking responsibilities.
CM: OH! Yeah, we gonna share! Ro: Yeah!

Ro: Cookie Monster, take the sugar and add
it to the big bowl.
CM: OK.

Ro: OK, you go first, now I’m gonna add
the brown sugar and our butter.
CM: Now we getting somewhere!
Ro: Yeah, look at that! CM: Yes!
Ro: Lastly, we are gonna add our vanilla extract.
Ro: Oooh-doo-doo, doo-doo-doo-doo-dooo!
CM: (Sniffs) Oh that smells good!
Ro: Yes it does!
CM: Mmmmmm! (Sniffs)

Ro: Now we’re gonna mix together until everything
is light and fluffy!
Ro: Ohhh.
CM: Ohhhh!
CM: Ohhhh! Ohhh, me getting dizzy!

Ro: We have got our butter and sugar creamed
together over here in this bowl. CM: Yeah.
CM: Yummy!
Ro: And now, we are gonna add 2 eggs.

Ro: You’re gonna crack an egg, mix it up,
and then repeat. Add your 2nd egg.

CM: You know, me, me make cookies with me
Mommy sometimes.
Ro: You do?
CM: Yeah! We have terrific time making cookies!
Ro: What kind of cookies do you make?
CM: Oh we make chocolate chippy! And we make big ones!
Ro: I’m making you a 5 Inch Cookie today!
CM: No way!
Ro: Yeah!
CM: That me favorite sized cookie!
Ro: Me too!
CM: 6, eh… 4, not quite… 5! That it!
Ro: It’s for your birthday.
CM: Thank you!

Ro: We have mixed in our eggs, we have got
our butter, cream and egg mixture ready, and...
CM: I like the hand motions.
Ro: Oh you like this?
CM: It’s really good.
Ro: Yeah it makes you feel like more legit!
CM: Yeah!
Ro: Too legit, too, too legit! Too, too legit, too, too, too legit!

Ro: Will you slowly add our dry ingredients
that we mixed together.
CM: OK, this?
Ro: Into the wet ingredients. And just eyeball it, I’ll mix
Ro: while you’re adding it.
CM: Me going to googly eyeball it.
Ro: Yeah OK, you googly eyeball it.
CM: That OK?
CM: Dry ingredients….
Ro: You got it.
CM: Into the wet ingredient… Ro: Uh-huh!

Ro: Mix it together, and then we’re gonna
add the other 1/2.
CM: OK, now we put in other 1/2?
Ro: Uh-huh!
CM: OK, dry into wet.
Ro: There you go, there you go! Nice!

CM: Mix that baby up and let’s get some
cookies!
Ro: Yes! Yes!

CM: Oh me looking at it again, me looking
again… Ro: Oh yeah!
CM: Me got to not do this! Ro: Uh-oh, uh-oh, uh-oh, uh-oh!
CM: Me getting dizzy! Ro: Uh-oh!
CM: Oh me going down!
Ro: Oh no!
CM: What a clean floor you have here!

Ro: The last ingredient that we are going
to add is our chocolate chips.
CM: Can me do that?
Ro: Yeah of course! Here you go, just make it rain!
CM: Make it rain!
Ro: Pour them into the bowl!

CM: Chocolate chips for the chocolate chip
cookies, and chocolate chips for
CM: the Cookie Monster! Om-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom! Ro: Oh no, no! Wait, wait, wait!
CM: OK, me going to put them in bowl.
Ro: OK fine, I’m watching you!

CM: OK me going to put chocolate chips into
the bowl…
Ro: Mmmmhmmm….
CM: Raining, raining, raining…. Ro: Mmmmhmmm.
CM: What!?
CM: What over there?
Ro: Where?
Ro: Huh!
Ro: Cookie Monster, are you sneaking chips?
CM: Me no sneaking chip….
CM: (Gulps)
Ro: OK, I’m gonna help add the rest of them.
CM: Oh yeah…
Ro: Just gonna pour them in….
CM: Ahhh-ahhh-ahhh, OK….

Ro: And, we’re gonna take a spatula, just
keep folding until they’re all mixed in.
CM: Oh boy!
Chocolate chip cookies, here we come!

Ro: And now it is time to bake our cookies,
over here I’ve got a baking sheet,

Ro: lined with a piece of parchment paper,
and our big scoop.
CM: That a big scooper!

Ro: OK,  so I’m gonna get in here, you
hold the bowl.
CM: OK me got it!
Ro: Hold it steady! CM: Me got it!
CM: OH!
Ro: I’m gonna place it over here.
CM: Boy oh boy!
CM: Look at that a beauty!

Ro: And you can bake it just like this, but
I’m gonna be using the palm of

Ro: my hand and flattening it down, just a
little bit.
CM: Oh you terrific at that!

Ro: Patting them down helps them spread out
even more when they’re baking.

CM: Because they get kind of melty, and then
they spread out a little bit,
CM: and then the chocolate chips get all melty.

CM: And do they get like crunchy around the
outside and soft in the middle?
Ro: Mmmhmmm.
CM: And they chocolatey?
Ro: Mmmhmmm.
CM: And they crunchy? Ro: Uh-huh!
CM: …… COOOOKIE!
CM: Ah-oh-ah-ah-ah-ah!
Ro: No, no wait, wait, you gotta wait! You gotta wait!
CM: OK, sorry, sorry!
Ro: You gotta wait! Gotta wait!
CM: Me take a deep breath….
CM: Oh boy those smell good! Ro: Oh yeah they do!
CM: COOKIE! AHHH!!!!
Ro: Oh wait, wait! CM: Sorry!
Ro: OK… CM: Sorry!

Ro: Now, once you got your cookies on the
sheet. CM: Yeah.
Ro: They are ready to bake! CM: They ready to bake!

Ro: We are gonna heat our oven to 375 degrees
and bake these for about
Ro: 7 to 9 minues.
Both: Ta-da!

Ro: Here are the chocolate chip cookies that
we made today!

Ro: In honor of Cookie Monster’s birthday
tomorrow.
CM: Yeah!
Ro: A big thank you to you Cookie Monster!
CM: Oh, thank you! This been so much fun!
Ro: Thank you for helping me bake!
CM: Oh thank you, mmm-mmmm-mmm! Ro: You are so sweet! And you are really good at making chocolate chip cookies!

CM: Yeah, me good at eating cookies too, wait
until you see this!
CM: Ahhhh!
Ro: No wait, 1, 1! CM: No, no, wait, OK…
Ro: I’ll give you 1.
Ro: Here you go, you can have 1.
CM: COOKIE!
CM: Om-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom!
CM: Ah-ah-ah-ah!
Ro: He like ‘em!

Ro: And, we made another video together on
the Sesame Street YouTube Channel.
CM: Oh yeah.

Ro: So I’m gonna be putting a link down
below.
CM: OH!
Ro: So go check it out!
CM: Yeah, in the basement!
Ro: Yeah, we make snacks together.
CM: Yeah, down there somewhere.
Ro: Mmmmhmmm, down there.
CM: Terrific!

Ro: You’ve been so patient, so here you
can have another Cookie.
CM: Huuuhhh! Oh boy, COOKIE! Om-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom!
CM: Oh they delicious! Ro: He love them!
CM: Om-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom! Ro: And I’ll be posting lots of photos
Ro: on Facebook, Tumblr, Instagram and Twitter.

Ro: And if you guys have any other ideas for any
other Nerdy Nummies, please let

Ro: me know, leave me a comment down below,
and I will do my best to make it happen.
CM: Me got another idea…
Ro: Yeah?
CM: How bout some more cookies?
Ro: For your birthday?

CM: Let’s get the eggs, let’s get the
flour,
CM: let’s do it all again!
CM: Om-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom-nom!
CM: Happy Birthday to me!
Ro: Happy Birthday! And bye you guys!
CM: Me gonna go down into the basement now.
Ro: Did you find more cookies down there?
CM: WHOA! There’s a whole stash of them down here!
CM: That where you keep the good stuff!
Ro: Yeah.
